CSS.AllowDuplicates
TYPE: bool
DEFAULT: false
VERSION: 4.8.0
--DESCRIPTION--
<p>
  By default, HTML Purifier removes duplicate CSS properties,
  like <code>color:red; color:blue</code>.  If this is set to
  true, duplicate properties are allowed.
</p>
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
